matches.noResults: No results found. Adjust your filters to discover models.

booking.title: Your Love Plans Ahead:
booking.subtitle: Got some dates lined up? Don not let the moment slip away ‚Äî great connections start with one meeting.
booking.emptyMessage: Don't wait too long ‚Äî your perfect match might just be one booking away!

policy.title: Booking & Payment Policy
policy.paymentHeld: Payment is held from your wallet when you book a service
policy.gpsCheckin: Both parties must GPS check-in at the location to verify attendance
policy.confirmOrDispute: After model completes, you have 48 hours to confirm or dispute
policy.cancellationNotice: Cancellation not allowed within 2 hours of booking start time

status.completedMessage: Your dates is completed, Please give us any feedbacks. Thank you.
status.confirmedMessage: Your booking is confirmed already, Make sure to meet your partner on time.
status.rejectedMessage: Your booking service is rejected by {{modelName}}
status.pendingMessage: Your booking is pending your date partner to confirm!

edit.locationPlaceholder: Enter the address or location where we'll meet
edit.attirePlaceholder: Let your partner know if there are any specific dress code requirements for the service....

delete.title: Delete Dating Booking!
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete:
delete.warningMessage: The date booking records will be permanently deleted.

cancel.title: Cancel Dating Booking!
cancel.description: Once you cancel this booking, you will not be able to undo it.
cancel.cancellationPolicyMessage: You cannot cancel within 2 hours of the booking start time. Please contact support if you need assistance.
cancel.refundPolicyMessage: If cancelled successfully, your payment will be refunded to your wallet immediately.

checkin.title: Check In
checkin.description: Verify your presence at the booking location
checkin.gpsVerificationMessage: Your location will be verified to confirm you are at the booking location (within 500m).

confirmModal.title: Confirm Completion
confirmModal.description: Confirm that the date service was completed successfully
confirmModal.serviceCompletionMessage: By confirming, you acknowledge that the model provided the service as agreed.
confirmModal.paymentReleaseMessage: The payment will be released from escrow to the model immediately after you confirm.
confirmModal.autoReleaseMessage: If you don't confirm or dispute within 48 hours, payment will be automatically released to the model.

disputeModal.title: Dispute Booking
disputeModal.description: Report an issue with this booking
disputeModal.beforeDisputingMessage: Please only dispute if the model did not show up or the service was not as agreed. False disputes may affect your account.
disputeModal.evidenceAvailableMessage: Our team will review GPS check-in records from both parties to verify the dispute.
disputeModal.reviewTimelineMessage: Disputes are typically reviewed within 24-48 hours. Payment remains on hold until resolved.
disputeModal.reasonPlaceholder: Please describe what happened in detail (minimum 10 characters)...
disputeModal.reasonHint: Be specific about what went wrong. This helps us resolve the issue faster.

history.title: Subscription History:
history.subtitle: Track all your subscription activities
history.emptyMessage: You don't have any subscription history yet.

list.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your love journey. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.

1Week.description: Explore all premium features and start connecting right away.

payment.subscribeMessage: You are about to subscribe to {{planName}}

topup.uploadInstruction: Please upload a clear photo or screenshot of your payment receipt
topup.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse

edit.title: Transaction Edit

statusMessages.approvedMessage: Your TopUp has been approved and added to your wallet balance.

statusMessages.rejectedMessage: Your TopUp request was rejected. Please contact support for more information.

delete.title: Delete Transaction
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
delete.warningMessage: The transaction record will be permanently deleted from your wallet history.

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.subtitle: Manage your personal details and profile information

password.title: Password
password.subtitle: Update your password to keep your account secure

twofa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twofa.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twofa.description: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.
twofa.description1: Download an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
twofa.description2: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.description3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
twofa.description4: Keep your backup codes in a safe place
twofa.step1: Download an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
twofa.step2: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
twofa.step4: Keep your backup codes in a safe place
twofa.instruction1: After you enable Two-Factor Authentication, you will be required to enter a verification code each time you log in.
twofa.instruction2: The code will be sent to your registered phone number. Please make sure you are using the correct phone number.

theme.darkDescription: Use dark theme to reduce eye strain at night

validation.invalidInputDetected: Invalid input detected. Please remove special characters or scripts.
validation.phoneNumberDigitsOnly: Phone number must contain only digits
validation.phoneNumberExactly10Digits: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits.
validation.invalidLaoPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid Lao phone number.
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
validation.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.firstNameLettersOnly: First name can only contain letters and spaces (English or Lao).
validation.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.lastNameLettersOnly: Last name can only contain letters and spaces (English or Lao).
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 30 characters long.
validation.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters (English, Thai, Lao), numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores.
validation.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
validation.dobFormat: Date of birth must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
validation.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old and under 100 years old.
validation.genderRequired: Gender must be one of: male, female, or other.
validation.bioMinLength: Bio must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.bioMaxLength: Bio must be at most 500 characters long.
validation.addressMinLength: Address must be at least 5 characters long.
validation.addressMaxLength: Address must be at most 200 characters long.
validation.careerMaxLength: Career must be at most 100 characters long.
validation.invalidCareerInput: Invalid input detected in career field.
validation.educationMaxLength: Education must be at most 100 characters long.
validation.invalidEducationInput: Invalid input detected in education field.
validation.interestMaxLength: Each interest must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.maxInterests: You can add up to 10 interests only.
validation.resetTokenLength: Reset token must be exactly 6 characters.
validation.invalidTokenFormat: Invalid token format. Must be 6 uppercase hexadecimal characters.

modelDating.title: My Dating Requests
modelDating.subtitle: Manage your dating and service booking requests from customers

policy.title: Secure Payment Policy
policy.paymentHeld: Payment is held securely when customer books your service
policy.gpsCheckin: Both parties must GPS check-in at the location to verify attendance
policy.customerConfirm: After completing, customer has 48 hours to confirm (auto-releases if no response)
policy.rejectRefund: If you reject a booking, customer will be automatically refunded

empty.title: No Dating Requests Yet
empty.description: You don't have any dating or service booking requests yet. They will appear here when customers book your services.

accept.title: Accept Booking
accept.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to accept this booking request?
accept.confirmDescription: By accepting this booking, you agree to provide the service at the specified date, time, and location. The customer will be notified of your acceptance.

reject.title: Reject Booking
reject.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to reject this booking request?
reject.confirmDescription: By rejecting this booking, the customer will be notified and will need to find another model. This action cannot be undone.
reject.reasonPlaceholder: Please provide a reason for rejecting this booking...

confirmed.title: Booking Confirmed
confirmed.description: You have accepted this booking request. Please prepare for the date.

completed.title: Booking Completed
completed.description: This booking has been completed successfully.

rejected.title: Booking Rejected
rejected.description: You have rejected this booking request.

pending.title: Pending Approval
pending.description: This booking is waiting for your approval. Please accept or reject.

cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
cancelled.description: This booking has been cancelled by the customer.

checkin.title: Check In
checkin.subtitle: Verify your presence at the booking location
checkin.gpsDescription: Your location will be verified to confirm you are at the booking location (within 50m).
checkin.geoNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
checkin.permissionDenied: Please allow location access to check in
checkin.locationError: An error occurred while getting your location

errors.locationRequired: Unable to get your location. Please enable GPS and try again.

complete.title: Complete Booking
complete.subtitle: Mark this booking as completed after finishing the service.
complete.confirmDescription: By marking this booking as completed, you confirm that the service has been successfully delivered to the customer.
complete.qrDescription: A QR code will be generated for the customer to scan and confirm the service completion.
complete.paymentDescription: Payment will be released to your wallet after customer scans QR or after 24 hours (auto-release).
complete.success: QR code generated! Let the customer scan to complete.

completeQR.title: Scan to Complete
completeQR.subtitle: Show this QR code to your customer to confirm service completion
completeQR.autoReleaseNote: If customer doesn't scan, payment will be auto-released after 24 hours
completeQR.instructionDescription: Ask your customer to scan this QR code with their phone camera or the app. Once they confirm, payment will be released to your wallet.

delete.title: Delete Booking
delete.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this booking?
delete.warningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone
delete.warningDescription: Deleting this booking will permanently remove it from your records. This action is only available for rejected bookings.

customerConfirmQR.title: Confirm Service Completion
customerConfirmQR.subtitle: Please confirm that the service has been completed satisfactorily
customerConfirmQR.alreadyCompletedDescription: This booking has already been confirmed and completed.
customerConfirmQR.expiredDescription: This QR code has expired. The payment will be automatically released to the model within 24 hours.
customerConfirmQR.paymentDescription: By confirming, you agree that the service was delivered as expected. The payment will be released to the model immediately.
customerConfirmQR.success: Service confirmed! Payment has been released.

errors.invalidQR: This QR code is invalid or has already been used

modelNotifications.subtitle: Stay updated with your bookings
modelNotifications.noNotificationsDescription: You'll see booking updates and messages here
